PillOptionProps.name: selected
PillOptionProps.description:
Represents the currently selected value. This option will be styled
differently as well as receive UX to scroll into view and start list
navigation from this element.

PillOptionProps.name: suggested
PillOptionProps.description:
If nothing is selected, suggest this option. Suggested options mimic the
UX of a selected option, scroll into view and start list navigation from
this element.

PillSelectProps.name: emptyMessage
PillSelectProps.description: When there are no children this will render

PillSelectProps.name: i18nScope
PillSelectProps.description:
The i18n key to use for the select's configurable strings.
Defaults to using the core library's default strings.

PillSelectProps.name: placeholder
PillSelectProps.description: Renders when the label is blank

PillSelectProps.name: tabIndex
PillSelectProps.description: Configurable tabIndex for the select button

PillSelectProps.name: getColor
PillSelectProps.description:
A function returning the display color of an option's `Pill`
`(option: unknown) => PillColor`

PillSelectProps.name: getGroup
PillSelectProps.description:
A function returning group ID for a given option to define a relation to `optgroups`
`(option: unknown) => string | number`

PillSelectProps.name: getId
PillSelectProps.description:
A function returning ID of a given option
`(option: unknown) => string | number`

PillSelectProps.name: getLabel
PillSelectProps.description:
A function returning label of an option
`(option: unknown) => string`

PillSelectProps.name: getSuggested
PillSelectProps.description:
A function returning `boolean` value to suggest this option if nothing is selected.
`(option: unknown) => boolean`

PillSelectProps.name: groupGetId
PillSelectProps.description:
A function returning the ID of a group
`(group: unknown) => string | number`

PillSelectProps.name: groupGetLabel
PillSelectProps.description:
A function returning label of a group
`(group: unknown) => string`

PillSelectProps.name: onClear
PillSelectProps.description:
It is possible for this component to have an empty value
(render placeholder). Enables the x icon.

PillSelectProps.name: onSearch
PillSelectProps.description: Adds a search bar to the select.
